statements: SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, points_scored FROM player_stats WHERE match_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, assists, blocks FROM player_stats WHERE points_scored > 20;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE assists > blocks;
SELECT player_id, match_id, points_scored, assists, blocks FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, match_id, points_scored, assists, blocks FROM player_stats WHERE points_scored > 20 ORDER BY assists DESC;
SELECT player_id, match_id, points_scored, assists, blocks FROM player_stats WHERE blocks >= 5 ORDER BY points_scored ASC, assists DESC;
SELECT player_id, match_id, SUM(points_scored) AS total_points_scored FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT match_id) AS matches_played, player_id FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id HAVING matches_played > 10;
SELECT player_id, AVG(points_scored) AS average_points FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id HAVING average_points > 15;
SELECT player_id, match_id, points_scored FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM match_details WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, assists, blocks FROM player_statistics ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT winning_team, losing_team, venue FROM match_details WHERE match_id = 10;
SELECT AVG(points_scored) AS avg_points FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, match_id, points_scored FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored > 20;
SELECT * FROM match_details WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT player_id, match_id, assists FROM player_statistics ORDER BY assists DESC;
SELECT player_id, match_id, blocks FROM player_statistics WHERE blocks > 5 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT match_id, venue, winning_team, losing_team FROM match_details WHERE winning_team = 'Team A';
SELECT * FROM Player
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT match_id, player_id, points_scored FROM MatchStats ORDER BY points_scored DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name FROM Player WHERE team_name = 'Lakers'
SELECT team_id, match_id, total_points FROM TeamStats WHERE match_id = 100 ORDER BY total_points ASC
SELECT * FROM MatchStats WHERE points_scored > 20 AND assists > 5 ORDER BY player_id DESC
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1001
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, points_scored FROM MatchStats ORDER BY points_scored DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT team_id, SUM(total_points), AVG(total_assists) FROM TeamStats GROUP BY team_id HAVING SUM(total_points) > 100
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name FROM Player INNER JOIN TeamStats ON Player.player_id = TeamStats.team_id
SELECT * FROM player_performance
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists FROM player_performance INNER JOIN player ON player_performance.player_id = player.player_id
SELECT team_name, match_date FROM match INNER JOIN team ON match.match_id = team.team_id
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists, blocks FROM player_performance INNER JOIN player ON player_performance.player_id = player.player_id WHERE assists > 5
SELECT player_name, points_scored FROM player_performance INNER JOIN player ON player_performance.player_id = player.player_id WHERE points_scored > 20 ORDER BY points_scored DESC
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists FROM player_performance INNER JOIN player ON player_performance.player_id = player.player_id
SELECT * FROM player_performance WHERE points_scored > 20 ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT team_name, match_date FROM team INNER JOIN match ON team.team_id = match.match_id
SELECT player_name, match_date FROM player_performance INNER JOIN player ON player_performance.player_id = player.player_id INNER JOIN match ON player_performance.match_id = match.match_id
SELECT SUM(points_scored) AS total_points, AVG(assists) AS avg_assists FROM player_performance
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, points_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, match_id, SUM(points_scored) AS total_points FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id, match_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS matches_played FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT name, team_name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_name = team.team_name;
SELECT player_id, match_id, points_scored FROM player_stats;
SELECT match_id, location, date FROM match WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, team_name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_name = team.team_name;
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM player;
SELECT coach.name, team.team_name FROM coach JOIN team ON coach.team_id = team.team_id;
